author: My Mom
quote: I told you to shut up and listen to me. Now, what were you about to say?

author: My Mom
quote: Even if I die, you are still grounded until you're 50 years old.

author: Henny Youngman
quote: If at first you don’t succeed, so much for sky diving.

author: Anonymous
quote: I dream of a better tomorrow, where chickens can cross the road and not be questioned about their motives.

author: Phyllis Diller
quote: Housework can’t kill you, but why take the chance?

author: Yogi Berra
quote: I never said most of the things I said.

author: Mark Twain
quote: Go to Heaven for the climate, Hell for the company.

author: Mae West
quote: Between two evils, I always pick the one I never tried before.

author: George Carlin
quote: Frisbeetarianism is the belief that when you die, your soul goes up on the roof and gets stuck.

author: George Burns
quote: When I was a boy the Dead Sea was only sick.

author: Joan Rivers
quote: I knew I was an unwanted baby when I saw my bath toys were a toaster and a radio.

author: Groucho Marx
quote: I intend to live forever or die trying.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: Always borrow money from a pessimist. He won’t expect it back.

author: Bob Thaves
quote: Inside me there’s a thin person struggling to get out, but I can usually sedate him with four or five cupcakes.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I was such an ugly kid. When I played in the sandbox the cat kept trying to cover me up.

author: Erma Bombeck
quote: I come from a family where gravy is considered a beverage.

author: Saint Peter (Free Code Camp Genius)
quote: On the internet, no one knows you're a one eyed cat.

author: Claude Pepper
quote: A stockbroker urged me to buy a stock that would triple its value every year. I told him, "At my age, I don't even buy green bananas"

author: Bill Murray
quote: My legs are so sore from the gym that i almost couldn't walk to the donut shop.

author: My Mom
quote: The early bird gets a seat on the bus to work.

author: Anonymous
quote: The shinbone is a device for finding furniture in a dark room.

author: Erma Bombeck
quote: The odds of going to the store for a loaf of bread and coming out with only a loaf of bread are 3 billion to one.

author: Ogden Nash
quote: Candy is Dandy. But liquor is quicker.

author: Rita Rudner
quote: To attract men, I wear a perfume called new Car Interior.

author: Caroline Rhea
quote: My favourite machine at the gym is the vending machine.

author: Ellen Degeneres
quote: Accept who you are. Unless you are a serial killer.

author: Anonymous
quote: I'm so broke, I can't even pay attention.

author: Edgar Bergen
quote: Hard work never killed anybody, but why take a chance.
